title: Copyfree Open Innovation License 0.3 (COIL-0.3)

must.title: Include Copyright
must.description: Describes whether the original copyright must be retained.

must.title: Include License
must.description: Including the full text of license in modified software.

cannot.title: Hold Liable
cannot.description: Describes the warranty and if the software/license owner can be charged for damages.

can.title: Distribute
can.description: Describes the ability to distribute original or modified (derivative) works.

can.title: Modify
can.description: Describes the ability to modify the software and create derivatives.

can.title: Commercial Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use the software for commercial purposes.

can.title: Private Use
can.description: Describes the ability to use/modify software freely without distributing it.

fulltext:
# Copyfree Open Innovation License

This is version 0.3 of the Copyfree Open Innovation License.

## Terms and Conditions

Redistributions, modified or unmodified, in whole or in part, must retain
applicable copyright notices, these conditions, and the following license terms
and disclaimer. Subject to these conditions, the copyright holders, authors,
and contributors of this work hereby grant to any person who obtains a copy of
this work in any form:

1. Permission to reproduce, modify, distribute, publish, sell, sublicense, use,
and/or otherwise deal in the licensed material without restriction.

2. A perpetual, worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free, irrevocable patent
license to reproduce, modify, distribute, publish, sell, use, and/or otherwise
deal in the licensed material without restriction, for any and all patents:

a. Held presently or in the future by each such copyright holder, author,
or contributor, necessarily infringed by the contributions of that
copyright holder, author, or contributor.

b. Necessarily infringed by the work at the time of contribution by that
copyright holder, author, or contributor.

NO WARRANTY OF ANY KIND IS IMPLIED BY, OR SHOULD BE INFERRED FROM, THIS LICENSE
OR THE ACT OF DISTRIBUTION UNDER THE TERMS OF THIS LICENSE, INCLUDING BUT NOT
LIMITED TO THE WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE,
AND NONINFRINGEMENT. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHORS OR COPYRIGHT HOLDERS BE
LIABLE FOR ANY CLAIM, DAMAGES, OR OTHER LIABILITY, WHETHER IN AN ACTION OF
CONTRACT, TORT, OR OTHERWISE, ARISING FROM, OUT OF, OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE
WORK, OR THE USE OF OR OTHER DEALINGS IN THE WORK.
